definition: to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself

sentences.english: The article deals with certain measures taken for surge and anti - surge control of centrifugal compressor.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述了离心式压缩机的喘振及防喘振控制问题。

sentences.english: The article deals with certain measures taken for surge and anti - surge control of centrifugal compressor.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述了离心式压缩机的喘振及防喘振控制问题。

sentences.english: The second, analyze the PDOS, we gain frequency of the breathing mode.
sentences.chinese: 第二，分析声子的振动谱，我们就得到了喘振频率。

sentences.english: Surging is ordinarily associated with separation and re-attachment in the diffuser.
sentences.chinese: 喘振通常与气流在扩散段内的分离和再附相联系。

sentences.english: Surge is a frequent problem in large axial flow adjustable suction fan.
sentences.chinese: 喘振是大型轴流可调式引风机经常出现的问题。

sentences.english: On this basis, the surge boundary line of the compressor was determined.
sentences.chinese: 在此基础上，确定了压气机的喘振边界线。

sentences.english: The factors which influence the reliability of surge prediction are also analysed.
sentences.chinese: 最后分析了影响轴流风机喘振预报可靠性的因素。

sentences.english: I have shut down my No3 engine due to compressor surge.
sentences.chinese: 我已关掉第三号发动机，因压缩器喘振。

sentences.english: Compressors are run up with the anti surge valve fully open.
sentences.chinese: 压缩机在启动时防喘振阀全开。

sentences.english: The method for eliminating surge of supercharging system is explored.
sentences.chinese: 探索消除柴油机增压系统喘振的方法。

sentences.english: What does the turbine super-charger surge?
sentences.chinese: 增压器喘振的原因是什么？

sentences.english: Anti-surge control is a crucial problem of the control system of a centrifugal compressor.
sentences.chinese: 防喘振是离心式压缩机控制中很重要的部分。

sentences.english: Automation control of centrifugal compressor set includes load control and anti-surge control.
sentences.chinese: 离心式压缩机组自动控制包括负荷控制和防喘振控制。

sentences.english: This paper presents a newly developed anti surge control system of the compressors.
sentences.chinese: 设计了一种新的压缩机防喘振控制系统。

definition: rating (for power output, flame resistance etc)
cylinder (of steam engine or internal combustion engine)
